tasks.title: Clear Receiving Area (sort pallets by category)
tasks.description: Stage Produce, Grocery, Frozen, Dairy, and vendor pallets in their designated spots.

tasks.title: Manage damages (Grocery / Frozen / Dairy)
tasks.description: Separate and place damages in correct areas; record notes for shrink.

tasks.title: Process paperwork in SAP (DSD & DC)
tasks.description: Post receipts, handle PODs when prompted, and verify details match paperwork.

tasks.title: Check Open Goods Receipts report
tasks.description: Make sure nothing is stuck open from earlier trucks.

tasks.title: File invoices
tasks.description: DSD → Friday folder; DC → DC Received folder.

tasks.title: Clear miscellaneous (crates/returns/strays)
tasks.description: Bottle/milk crates, vendor returns, stray pallets—remove to avoid backlog.
